verses.refrain: Blessed hour of prayer, Blessed hour of prayer, What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!
verses.verse: 'Tis the blessed hour of prayer, when our hearts lowly bend, And we gather to Jesus, our Savior and friend; If we come to Him in faith, His protection to share, What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

'Tis the blessed hour of prayer, when the Savior draws near, With a tender compassion His children to hear; When He tells us we may cast at His feet ev'ry care, What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!
